trans-unit.source: What's new in ATA version 1.4 | Microsoft ATA
trans-unit.target: What's new in ATA version 1.4 | Microsoft ATA

trans-unit.source: Lists what was new in ATA version 1.4 along with known issues
trans-unit.target: Lists what was new in ATA version 1.4 along with known issues

trans-unit.source: What's new in ATA version 1.4
trans-unit.target: What's new in ATA version 1.4

trans-unit.source: These release notes provide information about known issues in version 1.4 of Advanced Threat Analytics.
trans-unit.target: These release notes provide information about known issues in version 1.4 of Advanced Threat Analytics.

trans-unit.source: What's new in this version?
trans-unit.target: What's new in this version?

trans-unit.source: Support for Windows Event Forwarding (WEF) to send events directly from the domain controllers to the ATA gateway.
trans-unit.target: Support for Windows Event Forwarding (WEF) to send events directly from the domain controllers to the ATA gateway.

trans-unit.source: Pass-The-Hash detection enhancements on corporate resources by combining DPI (Deep Packet Inspection) and Windows event logs.
trans-unit.target: Pass-The-Hash detection enhancements on corporate resources by combining DPI (Deep Packet Inspection) and Windows event logs.

trans-unit.source: Enhancements for the support of non-domain joined devices and non-Windows devices for detection and visibility.
trans-unit.target: Enhancements for the support of non-domain joined devices and non-Windows devices for detection and visibility.

trans-unit.source: Performance improvements to support more traffic per ATA Gateway.
trans-unit.target: Performance improvements to support more traffic per ATA Gateway.

trans-unit.source: Performance improvements to support more ATA Gateways per ATA Center.
trans-unit.target: Performance improvements to support more ATA Gateways per ATA Center.

trans-unit.source: A new automatic name resolution process was added which matches computer names and IP addresses – this unique capability will save precious time in the investigation process and provide strong evidence for security analysts
trans-unit.target: A new automatic name resolution process was added which matches computer names and IP addresses – this unique capability will save precious time in the investigation process and provide strong evidence for security analysts

trans-unit.source: Improved ability to collect input from users to automatically fine-tune the detection process.
trans-unit.target: Improved ability to collect input from users to automatically fine-tune the detection process.

trans-unit.source: Automatic detection for NAT devices.
trans-unit.target: Automatic detection for NAT devices.

trans-unit.source: Automatic failover when domain controllers are not reachable.
trans-unit.target: Automatic failover when domain controllers are not reachable.

trans-unit.source: System health monitoring and notifications now provide the overall health state of the deployment as well as specific issues related to configuration and connectivity.
trans-unit.target: System health monitoring and notifications now provide the overall health state of the deployment as well as specific issues related to configuration and connectivity.

trans-unit.source: Visibility into sites and locations where entities operate.
trans-unit.target: Visibility into sites and locations where entities operate.

trans-unit.source: Multi-domain support.
trans-unit.target: Multi-domain support.

trans-unit.source: Support for Single Label Domains (SLD).
trans-unit.target: Support for Single Label Domains (SLD).

trans-unit.source: Support for modifying the IP address and certificate of the ATA Gateways and ATA Center.
trans-unit.target: Support for modifying the IP address and certificate of the ATA Gateways and ATA Center.

trans-unit.source: Telemetry to help improve customer experience.
trans-unit.target: Telemetry to help improve customer experience.

trans-unit.source: Known issues
trans-unit.target: Known issues

trans-unit.source: The following known issues exist in this version.
trans-unit.target: The following known issues exist in this version.

trans-unit.source: Network Capture Software
trans-unit.target: Network Capture Software

trans-unit.source: On the ATA Gateway, the only supported network capture software you can install is [Microsoft Network Monitor 3.4](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=4865).
trans-unit.target: On the ATA Gateway, the only supported network capture software you can install is [Microsoft Network Monitor 3.4](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=4865).

trans-unit.source: Do not install Microsoft Message Analyzer or any other network capturing software.
trans-unit.target: Do not install Microsoft Message Analyzer or any other network capturing software.

trans-unit.source: Installing other software will cause the ATA Gateway to stop functioning properly.
trans-unit.target: Installing other software will cause the ATA Gateway to stop functioning properly.

trans-unit.source: Installation from Zip file
trans-unit.target: Installation from Zip file

trans-unit.source: When installing the ATA Gateway, make sure to extract the files from the zip file to a local directory and install it from there.
trans-unit.target: When installing the ATA Gateway, make sure to extract the files from the zip file to a local directory and install it from there.

trans-unit.source: Do not install the ATA Gateway directly from within the zip file or the installation will fail.
trans-unit.target: Do not install the ATA Gateway directly from within the zip file or the installation will fail.

trans-unit.source: Uninstalling previous versions of ATA
trans-unit.target: Uninstalling previous versions of ATA

trans-unit.source: If you installed a previous version of ATA, Public Preview or Private Preview versions, you must uninstall the ATA Center and ATA Gateways before installing this release of ATA.
trans-unit.target: If you installed a previous version of ATA, Public Preview or Private Preview versions, you must uninstall the ATA Center and ATA Gateways before installing this release of ATA.

trans-unit.source: You must also delete the Database files and log files.
trans-unit.target: You must also delete the Database files and log files.

trans-unit.source: The databases from previous versions of ATA are not compatible with the GA version of ATA.
trans-unit.target: The databases from previous versions of ATA are not compatible with the GA version of ATA.

trans-unit.source: When you attempt to uninstall the ATA Center or ATA Gateway, if the ATA installation opens instead of the uninstallation, you will need to add the following registry key and then uninstall ATA again.
trans-unit.target: When you attempt to uninstall the ATA Center or ATA Gateway, if the ATA installation opens instead of the uninstallation, you will need to add the following registry key and then uninstall ATA again.

trans-unit.source: **ATA Center**
trans-unit.target: **ATA Center**

trans-unit.source: HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics\Center
trans-unit.target: HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics\Center

trans-unit.source: Add a new String value named `InstallationPath` with a value of `C:\Program Files\Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics\Center` .
trans-unit.target: Add a new String value named `InstallationPath` with a value of `C:\Program Files\Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics\Center` .

trans-unit.source: This is the default installation folder.
trans-unit.target: This is the default installation folder.

trans-unit.source: If you changed the installation folder enter the path where ATA is installed.
trans-unit.target: If you changed the installation folder enter the path where ATA is installed.

trans-unit.source: Registry editor for ATA Center installation path
trans-unit.target: Registry editor for ATA Center installation path

trans-unit.source: **ATA Gateway**
trans-unit.target: **ATA Gateway**

trans-unit.source: HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics\Gateway
trans-unit.target: HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics\Gateway

trans-unit.source: Add a new String value named `InstallationPath` with a value of `C:\Program Files\Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics\Gateway`.
trans-unit.target: Add a new String value named `InstallationPath` with a value of `C:\Program Files\Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics\Gateway`.

trans-unit.source: This is the default installation folder.
trans-unit.target: This is the default installation folder.

trans-unit.source: If you changed the installation folder enter the path where ATA is installed.
trans-unit.target: If you changed the installation folder enter the path where ATA is installed.

trans-unit.source: Registry editor for ATA Gateway installation path
trans-unit.target: Registry editor for ATA Gateway installation path

trans-unit.source: After uninstalling, delete the installation folder on both the ATA Center and the ATA Gateway.
trans-unit.target: After uninstalling, delete the installation folder on both the ATA Center and the ATA Gateway.

trans-unit.source: If you installed the Database in a separate folder, delete the Database folder on the ATA Center.
trans-unit.target: If you installed the Database in a separate folder, delete the Database folder on the ATA Center.

trans-unit.source: Health alert - disconnected ATA Gateway
trans-unit.target: Health alert - disconnected ATA Gateway

trans-unit.source: If you have more than one ATA Gateway and have Disconnected ATA Gateway alerts, automatic resolve will work on only one of them, leaving the rest in an Open status.
trans-unit.target: If you have more than one ATA Gateway and have Disconnected ATA Gateway alerts, automatic resolve will work on only one of them, leaving the rest in an Open status.

trans-unit.source: You must manually confirm that the ATA Gateway is up and the service is running and manually resolve the alert.
trans-unit.target: You must manually confirm that the ATA Gateway is up and the service is running and manually resolve the alert.

trans-unit.source: KB on virtualization host
trans-unit.target: KB on virtualization host

trans-unit.source: Do not install KB 3047154 on a virtualization host.
trans-unit.target: Do not install KB 3047154 on a virtualization host.

trans-unit.source: This may cause port mirroring to stop working properly.
trans-unit.target: This may cause port mirroring to stop working properly.

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: See Also

trans-unit.target: [Update ATA to version 1.6 - migration guide](ata-update-1.6-migration-guide.md)

trans-unit.target: [Check out the ATA forum!](https://social.technet.microsoft.com/Forums/security/home?forum=mata)
